```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(ggfx)
library(ggtext)
library(colorspace)
```


```{r}
data <- tibble(left = rbeta(10000, 5, 2),
               right = rbeta(10000, 2, 5),
               center = rbeta(10000, 5, 5)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(everything()) %>% 
  mutate(name = factor(name, 
                       levels = c("left", "center", "right"))) %>% 
  arrange(name)

labels <- tibble(label = c("faith", "hope", "love"),
                 name = c("left", "right", "center"),
                 x = c(0.5, 0.5, 0.5),
                 y = 0.01) %>% 
  mutate(name = factor(name, 
                       levels = c("left", "center", "right")))


plot <- ggplot(data) +
  as_reference(
    geom_text(data = labels, 
              aes(label = toupper(label),
                  x = x, y = y),
              size = 60,
              color = "#fbfef9", hjust = 0.5, 
              vjust = 0),
    id = "text"
  ) +
  with_blend(
    geom_density(aes(x = value, 
                     fill = name,
                     color = name),
                 show.legend = F),
    bg_layer = "text",
    blend_type = "xor"
  ) +
  labs(x = " ",
       y = " ",
       title = "The Shape of Distribution",
       caption = "**Graphic**: Sung Inkyung") +
  facet_wrap(~name, ncol = 1) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-0.1, 1.1)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#0081a7", "#00afb9",
                               "#f07167")) +
  scale_color_manual(values= darken(c("#0081a7", "#00afb9",
                               "#f07167"))) +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "black",
                                       color = NA),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "black",
                                        color = NA),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank(),
        strip.text = element_blank(),
        plot.caption = element_markdown(),
        plot.title = element_markdown(hjust = 0.5),
        axis.line = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
        )
  
ggsave(here::here("2021", "W40_FaithLoveHope", "W40_Distribution_of_FaithLovehope.png"), height = 22, width = 35, units = "cm")
  
```
